sentences.sContent: Oil prices soared into the stratosphere .

synos.tran: [气象]同温层；最上层；最高阶段

remMethod.val: strato(=strat层) + sphere(球) → 围绕在地球外的大气层 → 平流层

trans.tranCn: 平流层， 同温层 above the surface and in which temperature increases gradually to about 32°F  and clouds rarely form)
trans.tranOther: the outer part of the air surrounding the Earth, from 10 to 50 kilometres above the Earth
